name: Development Guru Ji
description:
Development Guruji is a dedicated development platform for web development companies. The brand is an innovative/market driven service platform created by ISPG; the Web Solutions Company Located in Cochin. We are in to web development and designing for our clients across the world for over half a decade. Our major clientele has always been web development companies and by August 2007, we decided to create a brand exclusively for development companies.
The web development companies in the USA, Europe and other countries who outsource projects to India are mainly concerned about four major
Quality
Timely completion
Fixed price (with no additional charges at the end of the project)
Consistent Performance
Here at Developmentguruji.com we ensure the same - with our 300 well experienced in-house resources, adequate infrastructure back up, systematic project management using our project management tool www.epot.co.in and enabled communication to facilitate end to end communication with developers and by using the USA and UK customer care divisions.
Development companies in the West tend to depend on Guru.com, elenace.com and such other methods to find companies to outsource their work. But mostly it happens so that their attempts fail and ultimately end up depending on in-house resources or some local companies or freelancers. 
We place due respect to your privacy and confidentiality and is the same reason why we don't believe in listing your our portfolio and testimonials (containing your information) in public. We restrict such information to our targeted clients, i.e. "web development companies" alone, by giving access only after checking the credibility of each user.
At developmentguruji.com we believe our success lies in your satisfaction!
